Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory257.png'}
{3: 'Focusing on the Mind Beacon above, Lucia strives to drift upward within the dark pit.'}
{3: 'Having gotten over her attachments and accepted her regrets, Lucia escapes the abyss before the M.I.N.D.s merge beyond the divergence point.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "...I've made it! The merge hasn't crossed the divergence point, and my consciousness hasn't been devoured!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "Hmph. You won't be that lucky next time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Looking in the direction of the voice, Lucia finds Alpha staring at her with her furrowed brows.'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'If not for the connection...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha tightens her grip, focusing her energy and rage onto her blade. And yet a hint of weariness appears on her face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're also affected by the M.I.N.D. quake?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: 'Before your consciousness completely dissolves, our minds will be tangled like a knot, impacting each other.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'So the voices I heard during the quake... It was you!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: 'What did you hear?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'α', 3: "Wait, no. I don't care what a dying person had heard.", 4: '2'}
{3: "Alpha's katana has amassed all of her energy, and she charges at Lucia and strikes—"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiHitNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: "With a loud ping, Alpha's flame is easily subdued. No matter how hard she tries, Alpha cannot extend her fire beyond herself."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Alpha, you are the one who cannot overcome her regrets.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'α', 3: "How can I still have regrets when I've been found?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Because you turned it into hate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "A person who is motivated by hate is the one who can't step into the future. Now... you won't be able to block this!", 4: '1'}
{3: "A chilling glow gathers on Lucia's katana. She lifts her head, her gaze on Alpha no longer in doubt."}
{2: 'α', 3: 'Good... If you want to use the connection to thwart me, then have a taste of this!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "No you won't!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Gathering a winter storm, Lucia's strike arrives with a sky full of snow, only to find Alpha not blocking or moving away. Instead, she dives forward and embraces Lucia."}
{3: "The katana pierces through Alpha's body. Although her physical form is unharmed in the M.I.N.D., her psyche still takes a heavy toll."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'What are you doing?!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Alpha says nothing. She clasps around Lucia's waist with one hand and grasps her neck with another one, and with Lucia in her arms, she jumps off the divergence point."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Alpha?! You want to dive deeper?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'α', 3: "Your hope won't save you, so drown in the goddamn truth!", 4: '1'}
{3: "The M.I.N.D. responses to Alpha's hatred and releases a thunderous roar. Shattered shards begin to fall everywhere."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "I'm not running from the past! I've accepted their betrayal—that's why I want to make a change!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't you want to change things as well? Isn't that why you became an Ascendant?!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'As they entangle and struggle, they once again fall into the Deep M.I.N.D.—'}
